{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=2010 |Team=Southern Illinois Salukis |Image= |ImageSize= |Conference=Missouri Valley Football Conference |ShortConference=Missouri Valley |CoachRank= |TSNRank= |Record=5â6 |ConfRecord=4â4 |HeadCoach=[[Dale Lennon]] |HCYear =2nd |OffCoach=[[Kalen DeBoer]] |OCYear =1st |DefCoach=Bubba Schweigert |DCYear =3rd |OScheme= |DScheme= |StadiumArena=[[Saluki Stadium]] |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} {{2010 MVFC football standings}} The '''2010 Southern Illinois Salukis football team''' represented [[Southern Illinois University Carbondale|Southern Illinois University]] in the [[2010 NCAA Division I FCS football season]]. The team was led by head coach [[Dale Lennon]] in his third season and played their home games at [[Saluki Stadium]]. They are members of the [[Missouri Valley Football Conference]].
